text: Variant DES_L755S_001 shows significant improvement in yield compared to parental mAb. Folding kinetics are fast.
Observed slight aggregation in D769H targeting candidates during elution at pH 3.0. Recommending shift to pH 3.5.
CDR3 aromatic balance in T798I designs seems to overcome the gatekeeper mutation steric hindrance.
Confocal microscopy confirms internalization of the antibody-drug conjugate (ADC) variant in HER2+ cell lines.
High aromaticity in the VH region correlates with increased non-specific binding in our recent SPR runs.
The new glycosylation-free variant shows a 20% increase in productivity without losing affinity.
